pages.title: Welcome to RoboJam!
pages.body: RoboJam's a super cool robot who sometimes forgets how to do things. Help him out with his controls by learning the basics of programming.

pages.title: Level 1: Functions
pages.body: Functions are self contained modules of code that accomplish a specific task. Functions usually take in data, process it, and return a result. Once a function is written, it can be used over and over and over again. Functions can be called from the inside of other functions.

pages.title: Instructions
pages.body:
Drag and drop the functions to complete the action
Hit 'Run' to see the function execute
View the code that makes it all come alive!
